query.result: 1 Kys t’eh eddyr jerrey yn trass oor 2 as toshiaght y laa liorish y chruinney 3 ta dy bragh gollrish paitçhey goaill bodjallys,

4 tanto pareva già inver’ la sera 5 essere al sol del suo corso rimaso; 6 vespero là, e qui mezza notte era.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into Manx.
10 quand’ io senti’ a me gravar la fronte 11 a lo splendore assai più che di prima, 12 e stupor m’eran le cose non conte;
query.result: 10 tra hooar mee dy row m’eddin goll er n’lhieggal 11 liorish y çhiass, va ny smoo na va roish shen, 12 as va mee goll er n’yindyssagh liorish ny reddyn nagh row aym fys er.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into Manx.
13 ond’ io levai le mani inver’ la cima 14 de le mie ciglia, e fecimi ’l solecchio, 15 che del soverchio visibile lima.
query.result: 13 Myr shen, hrog mee my laueyn seose gys mullagh 14 my hooillyn, as ren mee skeaylley jeh’n ghrian, 15 ta jannoo yn red ro-lhean jeh’n red ta shin currit dy akin.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into Manx.

query.result: 16 Myr tra ta’n grianchorrym skeaylley ass ushtey ny ass y ghlooaie 17 gys y çheu çheerey, 18 as eh goll seose er y aght cheyrtagh

19 a quel che scende, e tanto si diparte 20 dal cader de la pietra in igual tratta, 21 sì come mostra esperïenza e arte;

query.result: 25 «Cre’n red t’eh shen, aayr aalin, nagh voddym 26 cur sheyr er my eddin dy vel eh dy mie aym», 27 dooyrt mee, «as t’eh cosoylagh dy ve goll er n’gholl rishyn?».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into Manx.

query.result: 28 «Ny gow cur-y-tholl ort my t’ou foast goll er dty villish 29 liorish kynney yn aer», dooyrt eh rhym: 30 «ta fer er ve currit dy heet dy yannoo enney».

query.prompt:

31 Tosto sarà ch’a veder queste cose 32 non ti fia grave, ma fieti diletto 33 quanto natura a sentir ti dispuose».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into Manx.

query.result: 34 As tra hooar shin roie yn aal er ny h-aynsleyryn, 35 dooyrt eh lhiam lesh coraaghyn boggey: «Tar stiagh ayns shoh 36 gys staighrey ta ny smoo jeeragh na ny staigheryn elley».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into Manx.

Please translate each line literally into Manx.
